DC.name: Batcave - Shadow Box
DC.description: The LEGO® DC Batcave™ – Shadow Box (76252) captures the dramatic style of the Batcave from the 1992 film Batman Returns. This 3,981-piece set features a moving Bat-Signal and a display box that opens to reveal the detailed interior.

DC.name: Batmobile
DC.description: An iconic buildable Batmobile model from the classic DC Comics. The set features a detailed engine and a cockpit for the included Batman minifigure.
